snippet: The severance package had been part of the $11 billion merger agreement between American Airlines and US Airways.
abstract: Judge Sean H Lane rejects proposes severance package of nearly $20 million for Thomas W Horton, chairman and chief executive of the AMR Corporation, parent company of American Airlines; ruling finds that payout is not allowed under federal bankruptcy law.
lead_paragraph: The severance package had been part of the $11 billion merger agreement between American Airlines and US Airways.

headline.main: Judge Denies $20 Million Severance Deal for American Airlines Chief
